TopicTitle: Can I make Near Future Lithium In Situ?

Articles.Content:
The near future propulsion page seems to have been deleted, so I'm going to post this here (if this is the wrong subforum let be know). I've been using the Lithium Magnetoplasmadynamic engines from NFP on some of my cismunar transport craft, and they're really useful, but my space program is fueled primarily by Karbonite mined from the Mun's surface, and there's no way to turn karbonite into lithium (fair enough). What i want to know is if there's any mod out there with some sort of ISRU module that would let me produce lithium in space, so I wouldn't have to keep launching rockets from Kerbin to refill the tanks in my space station.

Thanks.
Near Future Propulsion contains a patch to add Ore->Lithium converters to the stock ISRU and Mini ISRU.
